original_text: But Onan did not want Tamar to give birth to his child. He knew that the child would not belong to him. So when he had sex with his brother's wife Tamar, he made his semen go onto the ground. Onan did this so that Tamar would not give birth to a child for his dead brother.
korean_text: 오난이 그 씨가 자기 것이 되지 않을 줄 알므로 형수에게 들어갔을 때에 그의 형에게 씨를 주지 아니하려고 땅에 설정하매

sentences.original_text: But Onan did not want Tamar
to give birth to his child
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아이를 낳는 것을 원하지 않았다
자기에게 속하지 않을 것이라는 것을 알았다

sentences.original_text: So when he had sex with his brother's wife Tamar
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그가 자기 형의 아내 다말과 성관계를 가질 때

sentences.original_text: he made his semen go onto the ground
so that Tamar would not give birth to a child
sentences.korean_translation: 다말이 아이를 낳지 않게 하기 위해서였다
